name: 22-global-451-research-NTT-Docomo-5GC-Software-AWS-Graviton
headline: NTT Docomo, NEC achieve energy-efficiency gains running 5GC software on AWS Graviton2
description: In following report, 451 Research’s Brian Partridge dives deeper into how NTT Docomo/NEC were able to unlock a power consumption savings of ~72% by utilizing AWS’s in house Silicon processor, Graviton 2, lifting and shifting NEC’s 5G Core software on to AWS Infrastructure.

name: 23-EMEA-en-US-omdia-other-ardm-elevating-automatic-ml-development-with-amazon-sagemaker-canvas-reprint
headline: Elevating Automatic ML development with Amazon SageMaker Canvas
description: In the report, you’ll learn how Amazon SageMaker Canvas helps elevate automatic ML development with a visual interface that allows business analysts to generate accurate ML predictions on their own—without requiring any ML experience or having to write a single line of code.

name: IDC Case Study: SPH Media Cloud Migration and Modernization with AWS
headline: IDC | Asia/Pacific (Excluding Japan) Case Study: SPH Media Cloud Migration and Modernization with AWS
description: In this case study IDC’s Daphne Chung documents part of SPH Media's digital transformation (DX) journey from a print-only media company to a digital-first media company by leveraging the power of cloud in partnership with AWS.

name: Omdia The Future of Telcos and the Cloud: New Business Models and Paths to Growth for 2030
headline: Omdia The Future of Telcos and the Cloud: New Business Models and Paths to Growth for 2030
description: Industry analyst firm Omdia, takes an in-depth look on an industry facing substantial challenges from regulatory constraints, rising customer data volumes, intense pricing competition, and challenges of generating sustainable returns from an increasingly complex technology estate.

name: Amazon Web Services Summit 2023
headline: IDC | AWS Doubles Down on Cloud Operations with FinOps and GreenOps Value Proposition
description: In this report, read IDC’s perspective on FinOps and GreenOps trends and learn how AWS is helping customers to achieve cloud cost optimization while accelerating their sustainability progress.

name: BARC Score Enterprise BI & Analytics Platforms
headline: BARC Score Enterprise BI & Analytics Platforms
description: In the Germany-based analyst firm BARC has evaluated Amazon QuickSight for the first time, and names QuickSight a Challenger in this study.

name: Frost & Sullivan | 2023 China Cloud Native Databases Market Report
headline: Frost & Sullivan | 2023 China Cloud Native Databases Market Report
description: Amazon Web Services was named a Leader in Frost & Sullivan 2023 China Cloud Native Databases Market Report and ranked No.1 in the overall score.

name: 2023 China Data Management Solutions Market Report
headline: Frost & Sullivan 2023 China Data Management Solutions Market Report
description: Amazon Web Services was named a Leader for the third year in a row, achieving the highest score in both Innovation Index and Growth Index.

name: Frost & Sullivan ‘Company of the Year Award’ for Global Automotive Cloud Computing Platform Industry
headline: Frost & Sullivan ‘Company of the Year Award’ for Global Automotive Cloud Computing Platform Industry
description: The award recognizes AWS for helping its customers embrace and integrate advanced software-defined vehicle capabilities, connected mobility, autonomous mobility, and digital customer experiences with a comprehensive set of purpose-built cloud computing solutions.

name: emea-ar-report-ardm-23-multi-public-cloud-services-eu
headline: ISG Provider Lens for Multi Public Cloud Services - Sovereign Cloud Infrastructure Services (EU)
description: In its recently published Provider Lens Quadrant Report for Multi Public Cloud Services, ISG named Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a leader in Sovereign Cloud Infrastructure Services (EU).

name: IDC Cloud Success for AWS Will Continue to be Data Driven
headline: IDC I Cloud Success for AWS Will Continue to be Data Driven, With Sustainability and Generative AI at the Heart
description: Learn what research analysts from IDC perceive as the key drivers behind the AWS success in the past decade, as well as how AWS addresses current customer needs such as real-world use cases of generative AI, the role of cloud to accelerate companies’ sustainability goals, or the continued ask to support vertical-specific business transformation.

name: EMEA-brand-awareness-content-download-yy-idc-ardm-finops-and-cloud-cost-governance-report
headline: IDC | Market Perspective - FinOps and Cloud Cost Governance: Shining a Spotlight on AWS' Cloud Financial Management Capability
description: In this report read IDC’s perspective on cloud cost management trends and how AWS is helping customers to optimize and manage cloud costs through AWS Cloud Financial Management solutions.

name: The Retail Planning Platforms Landscape
headline: 2023 Forrester The Retail Planning Platforms Landscape, Q3 2023
description: Forrester recognizes AWS as a notable vendor among retail planning platforms that help improve customer service, increase inventory turnover, and safeguard margins.

name: 2023 Gartner CCaaS Magic Quadrant
headline: 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Contact Center as a Service
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is named a Leader in the Gartner CCaaS Magic Quadrant for the first time since its cloud contact center solution, Amazon Connect, launched in 2017.

name: 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring and Observability
headline: 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring and Observability
description: This Magic Quadrant report is published annually and provides insight into the market’s direction, maturity and assesses vendors based on their Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision.

name: 451 Research Report | Serverless Technology Impact on Business
headline: 451 Research Report | Serverless Technology Impact on Business
description: Read the 451 Research report if you are considering adopting serverless architecture using AWS compute services such as AWS Fargate and AWS Lambda. The study reports a 35% annual cost reduction from using serverless technologies. 86% of these savings were from workforce-related serverless benefits, primarily attributed to a 54% reduction in the time and costs of maintenance, a 48% decrease in infrastructure setup, and a 19% reduction in application development.

name: Forrester | Advance GenAI Marketing From Pilot Projects To Proficiency
headline: Forrester | Advance GenAI Marketing From Pilot Projects To Proficiency
description: According to Forrester, more than one-quarter of AI decision-makers say integrating genAI with existing infrastructure presents the greatest barrier to generative AI (genAI) adoption. Marketing leaders, practitioners, and agency providers, especially, are now expected to shift their focus from experimenting with genAI to adopting and scaling its capabilities into their workflows.

name: Forrester | The Architect’s Guide To Generative AI
headline: Forrester | The Architect’s Guide To Generative AI
description: In this report, Forrester outlines the technical building blocks that will be needed, such as pipeline components, governance gates, and layers of intelligence, and the design patterns, like retrieval augmented generation, required to combine them. Forrester’s Architect’s Guide encourages technology architects to experiment rapidly to develop principles and views to guide infrastructure decisions around reliability, scalability, security, and governance. If implemented properly, architects will play a key role in navigating complex genAI tradeoffs and setting realistic expectations with business stakeholders.

name: The Forrester Wave: Augmented Business Intelligence Platforms
headline: The Forrester Wave: Augmented Business Intelligence Platforms, Q2 2023
description: Amazon QuickSight is noted as a top choice for native AWS BI, with strengths in innovation, product roadmap, partner ecosystem, and pricing flexibility and transparency.

name: 2023 Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems
headline: Gartner | 2023 Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems
description: Gartner has recognized Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a Leader and positioned it highest in ability to execute in the 2023 Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems among vendors evaluated.

name: IDC Perspective | 2023 A Grounded Assessment of GenAI in Industrial Operations
headline: IDC Perspective | 2023 A Grounded Assessment of GenAI in Industrial Operations
description: GenAI has been highly promoted in mainstream and technology media, but enterprises are still in the assessment stage for understanding the business impact of GenAI.

name: ISG | Provider Lens for Multi Public Cloud Services – Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services (Global)
headline: ISG | Provider Lens for Multi Public Cloud Services – Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services (Global)
description: In its recently published Provider Lens Quadrant Report for Multi Public Cloud Services, ISG named Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a global leader in Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services.

name: IDC MarketScape | Worldwide Cloud and Applications-Centric Marketplaces 2023 Vendor Assessment
headline: IDC MarketScape | Worldwide Cloud and Applications-Centric Marketplaces 2023 Vendor Assessment
description: IDC named Amazon a Leader, noting that “AWS Marketplace provides a seamless procurement and deployment experience for buyers and sellers.” Amazon also leads in strategy, with IDC noting that, “Continuous innovation has been a hallmark of AWS Marketplace's rapid cadence of new features and capabilities that address evolving customer needs.”

name: ISG | Provider Lens Mainframes – Services and Solutions
headline: ISG | Provider Lens Mainframes – Services and Solutions
description: AWS is a leader in ISG Provider Lens Mainframe Application Modernization Software U.S. quadrant 2024 report.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-aite-novarica-finserv-awards
headline: Aite-Novarica Impact Award Program: Business Transformation in Insurance
description: For the last 10 years, the Aite-Novarica Impact Awards have recognized IT initiatives that have had a real, positive impact on insurers’ businesses. Aite-Novarica's Impact Awards are designed to recognize and celebrate innovation achieved by financial institutions and insurers globally, leveraging technology to surpass the status quo. Find details on business goals, project sponsors, team structure, project timeline, tools and technology, challenges faced, success factors, and business results delivered. We hope you find the information valuable.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-amazon-web-services-modernization-accelerator
headline: Amazon Web Services Modernization Accelerator — AWS Helps Organizations Go Beyond Lift and Shift
description: Learn how AWS Modernization Accelerator (ModAx) offers prescriptive guidance and hands on support through a structured Modernization Accelerator program.

name: Canalys | The AWS Partner Opportunity: How cloud customers select and differentiate partners
headline: Canalys | The AWS Partner Opportunity: How cloud customers select and differentiate partners
description: This Canalys report identifies key factors that AWS customers consider important while selecting partners, and the value of partner programs perceived by AWS Partners.

name: Building the Business Case for Migrating SAP to the Cloud
headline: IDC | Building the Business Case for Migrating SAP to the Cloud
description: Modernizing SAP in a big bang transformation is intimidating and hard to justify for many organizations. This report helps you understand these considerations when building your business case for an SAP cloud migration.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-contact-center-as-a-service-wave
headline: Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS) Wave, Q1 2023
description: Discover why Forrester recognized AWS as a Leader and learn how you can transform your customer experience with Amazon Connect.

name: Data-First Transformation for Value Realization in Insurance
headline: Celent | Data-First Transformation for Value Realization in Insurance
description: Learn how Resolution Life partnered with AWS and low code no code (LCNC) provider Out Systems to accomplish transition of closed block policies from Voya.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-forrester-public-cloud-buying-guide
headline: Forrester’s Public Cloud Buying Guide, 2023
description: Forrester’s Public Cloud Buying Guide covers key criteria decision makers should consider when choosing their primary public cloud provider. The report can be a great tool for decision makers to help select the best public cloud provider for their unique needs.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-forrester-wave-functions-as-a-service-platforms
headline: The Forrester Wave: Functions-As-A-Service Platforms, Q2 2023
description: AWS Lambda named a leader in The Forrester Wave: Functions-As-A-Service Platforms, Q2 2023. The Forrester Wave evaluation highlights Leaders, Strong Performers, Contenders, and Challengers. It’s an assessment of the top vendors in the market.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-forrester-wave-integrated-software-delivery-platforms
headline: The Forrester Wave: Integrated Software Delivery Platforms, Q2 2023
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is named a Strong Performer in Forrester’s 2023 Integrated Software Delivery Platform (ISDP) Wave. ISDPs combine the automated DevOps tools and infrastructure used to take software from code to production into integrated platforms that include continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), developer tools, application security, and infrastructure-as-code (IaC).

name: global-ar-report-ardm-fwd-insurance-smart-insurance-framework
headline: FWD Insurance: Smart Insurance Framework – AI Everywhere
description: FWD Group was awarded the Celent Model Insurer award in 2022 for the Data, Analytics, and AI category, for its ability to orchestrate an overarching data strategy with the FWD Smart Insurance Framework providing data-centric guidance for developing analytics and AI/ML initiatives. Learn how to create a simpler, faster and smoother customer journey in insurance by developing a data strategy framework and placing data management at the core.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-gartner-sustainability-assessment-for-amazon
headline: Gartner | Sustainability Assessment: Amazon
description: In this report, Gartner measures Amazon’s overall sustainability program across 19 sustainability metrics aligned within the three dimensions of the ESG model - Environmental sustainability, Social sustainability and Governance.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-gartner-vendor-rating
headline: Gartner | Vendor Rating: Amazon
description: In this report, Gartner provides ratings for six business categories: Product/Service, Support/Account Management, Pricing Structure, Technology/Methodology, Strategy, and Corporate Viability.

name: Quick Answer: How Should Executive Leaders Respond to Cloud Vendor Lock-in Concerns?
headline: Quick Answer: How Should Executive Leaders Respond to Cloud Vendor Lock-in Concerns?
description: This research provides an executive leader’s perspective on Cloud Governance Best Practices: Managing Vendor Lock-In Risks in Public Cloud IaaS and PaaS. Gartner VP Analyst Lydia Leong states that organizations cannot avoid lock-in somewhere in the value chain of their IT suppliers, or even with the internal IT team that builds and maintains IT solutions.

name: How technology vendors are approaching sovereign cloud delivery
headline: Omdia | How technology vendors are approaching sovereign cloud delivery
description: In this report, read Omdia’s take on the AWS approach to digital sovereignty – a commitment to offering all customers the most advanced set of sovereignty controls and features available in the cloud.

name: Celent | HSBC AI Global Tactical Index - An Artificially Intelligent Global Investment Strategy Powered by AWS
headline: Celent | HSBC AI Global Tactical Index - An Artificially Intelligent Global Investment Strategy Powered by AWS
description: The HSBC AI Global Tactical Index (AiGT) is a rules-based investment strategy that uses advanced techniques in artificial intelligence (AI) to invest opportunistically across a global portfolio of equities, gold, and bonds.

name: Gartner I Hype Cycle for Retail Technologies, 2023
headline: Gartner I Hype Cycle for Retail Technologies, 2023
description: Technology is driving innovation in modern retail. Gartner recognizes Amazon / Amazon Web Services as a sample vendor 7 times in this evaluation.

name: IDC | The Very Group: The DNA of Data Value Creation through AI
headline: IDC | The Very Group: The DNA of Data Value Creation through AI
description: Find out how the Very Group developed a data framework to turn data into insight for enhanced customer experience and more effective decision making.

name: Policy Based Access Management
headline: KuppingerCole | Policy Based Access Management
description: This KuppingerCole Leadership Compass features an executive summary, key capabilities, and an evaluation of 15 vendors with policy-based access control offerings and provides guidance on aligning a vendor’s solution to common corporate access control requirements. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is selected as an Overall Leader in the policy-based access management report for its strong capabilities in fine-grained authorization, security, corporate governance, and scalability.

name: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Container Management
headline: Gartner | Magic Quadrant for Container Management
description: For Gartner clients, “a Gartner Magic Quadrant is a culmination of research in a specific market, giving you a wide-angle view of the relative positions of the market’s competitors. By applying a graphical treatment and a uniform set of evaluation criteria, a Magic Quadrant helps you quickly ascertain how well technology providers are executing their stated visions and how well they are performing against Gartner’s market view.”

name: Gartner Desktop as a Service (DaaS) Magic Quadrant
headline: Gartner | Desktop as a Service (DaaS) Magic Quadrant
description: To help IT leaders evaluate different DaaS vendors and build an effective end-user computing strategy, Gartner published its inaugural 2023 Magic Quadrant for DaaS evaluation.

name: Cloud Kings in Financial Services: An Insider's View
headline: Celent | Nasdaq - Cloud Kings in Financial Services: An Insider's View
description: Celent’s global head of Capital Markets Monica Summerville, lead this video format report with Marc Murphy, SVP Nasdaq, Head of Global Connectivity & Colocation and Magnus Haglind, SVP & Head of Product Management for Marketplace Technology.

name: global-ar-report-ardm-partner-ecosystem-multiplier
headline: Partner Ecosystem Multiplier: The AWS Opportunity
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Partners with a breadth of offerings can achieve a $6.40 multiplier per $1 AWS sold. Learn about the Partner multiplier opportunities at a country level.

name: The Forrester Wave: SaaS Marketplaces, Q4 2023
headline: The Forrester Wave: SaaS Marketplaces, Q4 2023
description: This Forrester report is a starting point for software buyers and technology leaders to identify the right partner for SaaS sourcing needs. Read the report to identify the SaaS marketplace attributes most relevant to the needs of your organization, helping you to unlock growth and development opportunities.

name: Societe Generale: Treating Data Like an Asset
headline: Celent | Societe Generale: Treating Data Like an Asset
description: Societe Generale is the winner of Celent’s Model Sell Side 2023 Award for Data & Analytics. In this award case study, Celent focuses on how Societe Generale’s Global Markets (SG Markets) embarked on a win-win initiative that extended and digitally transformed an existing legacy platform to internal and external clients.

name: Quick Answer: Which Cloud Provider Offers the Best Generative AI Business Outcomes?
headline: Quick Answer: Which Cloud Provider Offers the Best Generative AI Business Outcomes?
description: Generative AI (GAI) is an emerging collection of technologies and practices. In this report, Gartner addresses concerns of whether GAI may radically shift the market dynamics for cloud IaaS+PaaS and whether organizations should switch providers to effectively leverage GAI.

name: Omdia Market Radar: Cloud Platforms for Games 2023
headline: Omdia Market Radar: Cloud Platforms for Games 2023
description: Omdia has named AWS for Games a Cloud Platforms for Games Leader in the first-of-its-kind industry benchmark.

name: IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Data Clean Room Technology 2024 Vendor Assessment
headline: IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Data Clean Room Technology 2024 Vendor Assessment
description: Companies across multiple industries increasingly look to build a complete view of their customers or business by complementing their data with external business partners’ data. To achieve this, companies are investing in data clean rooms to allow multiple parties to analyze their collective datasets to facilitate more data-driven, strategic analyses with more comprehensive insights.

name: GLOBAL-brand-awareness-content-download-forrester-ardm-future-of-manufacturing-report
headline: The Future of Manufacturing
description: In this report, Forrester outlines the major developments—both external and internal—that will transform manufacturing in the coming years and decades.

name: GLOBAL-brand-awareness-content-download-gartner-ardm-market-guide-for-retail-smart-check-out-solutions-report-learn.html
headline: 2023 Gartner Market Guide for Retail Smart Check-Out Solutions
description: Gartner recognizes AWS as a Representative Vendor among retail smart check-out solutions to transform businesses toward unified retail commerce.

name: ISG | SAP HANA Infrastructure Services Provider Lens Report
headline: ISG | SAP HANA Infrastructure Services Provider Lens Report
description: In its recently published Provider Lens Quadrant Report for Public Cloud – Solutions and Services, ISG named Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a leader in SAP HANA Infrastructure Services.

name: Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools
headline: Gartner I 2023 Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools (DIT)
description: Amazon Web Services is recognized for the second year in a row in the Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools. Last year, we were placed in the Niche Players Quadrant for Ability to Execute and completeness of vision.

name: Gartner | 2023 Magic Quadrant for Strategic Cloud Platform Services
headline: Gartner | 2023 Magic Quadrant for Strategic Cloud Platform Services
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) was named a Leader in the 2023 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Strategic Cloud Platform Services (SCPS). This report replaces the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud Infrastructure and Platform Services (CIPS).

name: Amazon QuickSight Makes Significant Advancements into the Business Intelligence Software Market
headline: 2023 IDC | Amazon QuickSight Makes Significant Advancements into the Business Intelligence Software Market
description: According to IDC, Amazon QuickSight has emerged as an enterprise-grade, cloud-native and comprehensive BI solution that empowers organizations with analytics and visualizations for multiple user personas at scale, superior performance, and at optimized costs.

name: ISG | Provider Lens for Multi Public Cloud Services – Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services (Brazil)
headline: ISG | Provider Lens for Multi Public Cloud Services – Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services (Brazil)
description: In its recently published ISG Provider Lens Quadrant Report for Multi Public Cloud Services in Brazil, ISG named Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a leader in Hyperscale Infrastructure and Platform Services.

name: IDC MarketScape: Latin America Public Cloud Infrastructure as a Service 2023 Vendor Assessment
headline: IDC MarketScape: Latin America Public Cloud Infrastructure as a Service 2023 Vendor Assessment
description: IDC MarketScape report, the first developed in the Latin America region, provides a comprehensive evaluation of cloud infrastructure vendors in Latin America, with AWS being named as a Leader.

name: Generative AI in Motion with Travelers Insurance | Fireside Chat at Amazon re:Invent
headline: Generative AI in Motion with Travelers Insurance | Fireside Chat at Amazon re:Invent
description: Travelers Insurance CIO/COO of Bond and Specialty Insurance, Tracey Cournoyer and AWS Bedrock senior manager Harshal Pimpalkhute lead our deep dive session that’s moderated by AWS enterprise account (Travelers) manager, Clinton Reeves.

name: 5G Operational Readiness: AWS' Strategy Continues to Evolve
headline: 5G Operational Readiness: AWS' Strategy Continues to Evolve
description: IDC Observes Market Developments and Dynamics Affecting AWS Amidst Communications Services Providers (CSPs) Rapid Cloud Native Adoption and 5G Monetization. Communication service providers (SPs) are shifting their focus to build/adopt cloud native services, implement data in their decision making process, and automate applications for their networks. John Byrne of IDC dives deeper into how AWS is working with CSPs to meet the market where it is, developing technology enabling CSPs to reach their desired business outcomes.

name: Who Do Telecom Service Providers See as the Best Partner
headline: Who Do Telecom Service Providers See as the Best Partner to Help with Their Digital Transformation?
description: IDC examines survey results of Communications Services Providers for execution of Digital Transformation Goals. A key finding revealed that 81% of communication service providers identified cloud providers as the partners best suited to help with their digital transformation plans, up from 78% in 2021.
